links.title: Xponential Fitness Debuts New Digital Platform Xponential+
links.description: IRVINE, Calif.--()-- Xponential Fitness, Inc. (NYSE: XPOF) ("Xponential"), the leading curator of boutique fitness brands across ten fitness modalities, announced today its new digital platform Xponential+ ("XPLUS") has officially launched, providing live and on-demand access to the same sought-after workouts offered in thousands of studio locations around the globe.

$PHUN
 2022-04-19 09:00 ET 

Phunware Partners with Accion Labs to Provide Mobile Solutions for Digital Transformation
https://stonkmoon.com/news/PHUN/23c5588b78ca126601033c3ef3650384

links.title: Phunware Partners with Accion Labs to Provide Mobile Solutions for Digital Transformation
links.description: The resulting center of excellence will make Phunware's MaaS platform the mobile solution of choice for Accion's international digital transformation services spanning 22 countries and supported by more than 5,000 employees. "Accion provides a framework of industry-leading technologies to help our clients grow, increase shareholder value and better engage their target audiences," said Kinesh Doshi, Founder and CEO of Accion Labs.
